name: Tuyul The Adventure 3D
description: Tuyul the adventure 3D game is a single playe game the third person view adventure genre based on android which tells the journey of a ghost who is often known as "Tuyul" who wants seek and take revenge on a mbah shaman who has persuaded both of his parents to sacrifice himself as a sacrifice. On the way, the tuyul encountered a lot of obstacles and the obstacle that has been created by the mbah shaman, even the mbah shaman has ordered his subordinates such as gendruwo, pocong, kuntilanak and sundel perforated to block and disturb the tuyul so that the tuyul does not can find a shaman grandmother
